author: bayard
msg: Applying Oliver Heger's patch for CLI-121, changing a HashSet to a LinkedHashSet so we pass tests on JDK 1.6. This moves us to a JDK 1.4+ dependency, but I don't think that's an issue.

author: etnu
msg: It turns out that many sites have more than one sub domain, and I wasn't smart enough to realize this, so I re-introduced the parent parameter in a way that is both compatible with existing sites and secure. You may now use a regular expression to validate that the parent parameter is acceptable for the given syndicator, and gadgets.rpc will append your parentRelayUrl to the "parent" parameter. Since the server is validating the parent, this can be trusted.

Also found and fixed the cause of of SHINDIG-43 in the process. The problem turned out to be a slightly different hashing algorithm that was changing the order of dependencies in the set, and our code didn't take that into account.

author: tomdz
msg: Fixes for Hsqldb, Derby, MySql, Oracle platforms for the change column tests

author: crossley
msg: Update some NOTICE files to 2008 because code below it has been modified.
